original_text: This day I will begin to put the dread and fear of you on the peoples who are under the whole heaven, who shall hear the report of you and shall tremble and be in anguish because of you.’
korean_text: 오늘부터 내가 천하 만민이 너를 무서워하며 너를 두려워하게 하리니 그들이 네 명성을 듣고 떨며 너로 말미암아 근심하리라 하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: This day I will begin to put the dread and fear of you
sentences.korean_translation: 오늘 내가 너희에 대한 두려움과 공포를 심기 시작하리라

sentences.original_text: on the peoples who are under the whole heaven
sentences.korean_translation: 온 하늘 아래 모든 민족 위에

sentences.original_text: who shall hear the report of you
and be in anguish because of you
